nodes.excerpt: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
nodes.title: Shareful - Supercharge the macOS share menu
nodes.author: Sindre Sorhus

localize.description: 很多应用都包含了系统的 "共享 "菜单，但默认的共享服务通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服务，比如复制、打开在、另存为和保存到下载。
localize.tagline: 超级充电的macOS共享菜单

localize.description: 很多應用都包含了系統的 "共享 "菜單，但默認的共享服務通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服務，比如複製、打開在、另存爲和保存到下載。
localize.tagline: 超級充電的macOS共享菜單

nodes.excerpt: Paraglide is the first machine learning API that lets you create, customize, and collaborate on automated AI workflows in minutes. Modify what you want, and let us handle the rest.

nodes.author: Robleh Jama

localize.tagline: 在几分钟内创建自动化的AI工作流程。

localize.description: Paraglide是第一個機器學習API，讓你可以在幾分鐘內創建、定製和協作自動化AI工作流程。修改你想要的東西，讓我們來處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內創建自動化的AI工作流程。

nodes.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
nodes.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer
nodes.author: Charlie Fogarty

localize.description: Storetasker 会在几小时内为您匹配到值得信赖的 Shopify 专家，为您提供大大小小的项目。我们已经采访了超过5000名开发人员，亲自挑选了前5%的开发人员，并从头到尾简化了体验。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪里遇到他们的开发者

localize.description: Storetasker 會在幾小時內爲您匹配到值得信賴的 Shopify 專家，爲您提供大大小小的項目。我們已經採訪了超過5000名開發人員，親自挑選了前5%的開發人員，並從頭到尾簡化了體驗。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪裏遇到他們的開發者

nodes.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
nodes.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!
nodes.author: Sarel van Baalen

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

nodes.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
nodes.title: Kudosbot - Your friendly neighbourhood kudos spreader.
nodes.author: Nikhil Gurnani

localize.description: 这是一个漫长的2020年，嗯？🥵 有时候，感谢一个人对你的帮助是远远不够的。在公共Slack频道里给他们发个 "赞"，和大家一起分享他们的精彩，传播一点正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好邻居的赞誉传播者。

localize.description: 這是一個漫長的2020年，嗯？🥵 有時候，感謝一個人對你的幫助是遠遠不夠的。在公共Slack頻道里給他們發個 "贊"，和大家一起分享他們的精彩，傳播一點正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好鄰居的讚譽傳播者。

nodes.title:
US Real GDP fell 2.5% in 2020 while stocks rose 18%.

Only other year stocks finished higher with a decline in growth of this magnitude? 1938. https://t.co/En3Zrvkhaq
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
2020年美国实际GDP下降2.5%，而股市却上涨18%。

只有其他年份的股票完成了上涨，但增长率却下降了这么多? 1938年。https://t.co/En3Zrvkhaq

2020年美國實際GDP下降2.5%，而股市卻上漲18%。

只有其他年份的股票完成了上漲，但增長率卻下降了這麼多? 1938年。https://t.co/En3Zrvkhaq

nodes.title:
His GameStop shares had been a Kwanzaa gift from is mom, and he’d held on to them since he was 8 years old. But when the time was right to sell them, he knew it. 

Oh, he’s 10.

nodes.title:
*Ring ring*

"Hello GameStop how can I help you?"

"Yea hi I'm calling to buy 500 shares."
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
*戒指

"你好，游戏机公司，请问有什么可以帮你？"

"是的，你好，我打电话买500股。"

*戒指

"你好，遊戲機公司，請問有什麼可以幫你？"

"是的，你好，我打電話買500股。"
